body:
Hi Lars,


If you are using ranimate, you should be avoiding startup costs  
already as it typically employs the rpict -S option to read views  
from the standard input unless the ANIMATE variable is specified.   
So, you should only have to wait on the first frame.  Is this what is  
happening?


-Greg
___
